column5: Hi all,  I hope everyone had a great weekend.  I'm booked at West Nippising Resort for May 24th-27th. Can't wait.  Any advice or tips for this area would be appreciated. If you have a map of the area as well, that would be appreciated.  For pike, I'm bringing spoons, crankbaits, spinners, and buzz baits.  For walleye, I've got jigs with plastics minnows, and crankbaits.  Thanks in advance.

Hi Bassman Everything you mentioned should  work well ,I will also be up there on the long weekend  at my moms cottage in north west  bay a short boat ride from where you are staying. Maybe I'll see you on the water
Thanks,  I'll be the guy wearing the orange ball cap. Feel free to drop by.
Don't bother trying Leeches, because they don't work!
Try to add some worm harnesses for walleye to your arsenal, I don't leave home without them.   Tip it with a minnow or worm depending how warm the water is, cold = minnows warm = worms.
Bassman, give me an email address and I will send you some good advice.
